title: Ranked lobby bug?
body:
Hi there.

Was just in ranked lobby and got booted from said lobby, and lost 22 LP.

I wasn't picking, I wasn't banning, and I didn't lose connection.

I feel like this is...unfair. lol.

Anyone else/anyone know why that would happen?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like you experienced a connection issue, have you experienced this since?
